doc:
Carla Laemmle https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Carla_Laemmle 0 Rebekah Isabelle Laemmle (October 20, 1909 – June 12, 2014), professionally known by screen name Carla Laemmle, was an American actress of German Jewish descent, and the niece of Universal Pictures studio founder Carl Laemmle. She was a movie actress in the 1920s and 1930s, and one of the longest surviving actors of the silent film era. Her career in motion pictures was also one of the longest on record, spanning 1925 to 2014. Rebekah_Isabelle_Laemmle ( October_20_,_1909 – June_12_,_2014 ) , professionally_known by screen_name_Carla_Laemmle , was an_American_actress of German_Jewish_descent , and the_niece of Universal_Pictures_studio_founder_Carl_Laemmle . She was a_movie_actress in the_1920s_and_1930s , and one of the_longest_surviving_actors of the_silent_film_era . Her_career in motion_pictures was also_one of the_longest on record , spanning 1925 to 2014 .
